channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Embed Peertube Playlist
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Embed Peertube Playlist

item.title: CVE-2024-4602|2024-08-01T20:47:41.440Z -- unknown -- embed%20peertube%20playlist
item.description: The Embed Peertube Playlist WordPress plugin before 1.10 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-4602|2024-07-13T06:00:06.435Z -- unknown -- embed%20peertube%20playlist
